item.arkham_sticks.sepulchral_dust.toolt: The dust consists of triangular grains, all the same size: miniscule pyramids in your palm.
item.arkham_sticks.sepulchral_shards.too: It smells of metal and mold. Cold to the touch.
subtitles.arkham_sticks.block.sepulchral: Strange resonances echo from the bricks
